# Amazon Classification (Region 4)

<img src=".github/images/sits_sticker.png" alt="SITS icon" align="right" height="150" width="150"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Amazon classification using Landsat collection (1996 - 2022) for Region 4 defined in the scope of the Restore+ Project.

## Getting started

To get started with the examples in this repository, first clone the repository:

```sh
git clone https://github.com/restore-plus/classification-amazon-region-4
```

Next, open the `classification-amazon-region-4` directory in the RStudio and install the package:

```r
devtools::install(".")
```

You can also use [renv](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/):

```r
renv::restore()
```

## Repository structure

- `data/`: Analysis data
- `analysis/`: Processing scripts
- `R/`: Utilities for the processing scripts
